title: Approaching Instantaeous Velocity
text: The value that is being approached by the average velocities as $$t$$ gets closer to $$4$$ seconds is likely the instantaneous velocity when $$t=4$$.
speech: The value that is being approached by the average velocities as , t  gets closer to  4  seconds is likely the instantaneous velocity when  t is equal to 4 .
pacedSpeech: The value that is being approached by the average velocities as  , t
seconds is likely the instantaneous velocity when   t is equal to 4
